heading: HB06837
0: AN ACT ACCELERATING THE DEVELOPMENT OF A NATIONAL RAILWAY SYSTEM, CREATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE NATIONAL RAILWAY AUTHORITY, PRESCRIBING ITS POWERS, FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06837
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ACCELERATING THE DEVELOPMENT OF A NATIONAL RAILWAY SYSTEM, CREATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE NATIONAL RAILWAY AUTHORITY, PRESCRIBING ITS POWERS, FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : RODRIGUEZ, MAXIMO JR.B.
DATE FILED : 2017-12-12
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Lopez (M.L.) (000 2018-09-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-31
          -A TWG was created, to be chaired by Rep. Mark Go, to consolidated all measures (19) proposing to amend the PNR, creation Mindanao Railways and other rail-related measures
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-14
          -1st TWG meeting. Secretariat to consolidate the 19 measures and forward substitute bill to the Committees on Appropriations and Ways and Means for comments
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2018-03-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON TRANSPORTATION
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION on 2018-01-15;SECONDARILY REFERRED TO TRANSPORTATION on 2018-01-15;
